name: La Romana Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent a too-short 24 hours in Culebra and were fortunate to be able to book here for the night. The owner is great, warm and very helpful in giving us a map to orienting us and giving suggestions as to how to maximize our time. I think the best part of her hospitality was keeping us updated on the status of the tropical storm that was skirting by the island. We stayed in the studio apartment and were very comfortable. The mattress was not the most comfortable but it was ok. The AC was good and we enjoyed watching some tv to relax in the evening from our busy afternoon. Plenty of hot water in the shower. The kitchenette was convenient, allowing us to keep our water and flan chilled in the minifridge. The grounds are nicely kept. We had rented a golf cart and there was plenty of parking in front of the property.
reviews.title: Wonderful hospitality! We will be back!

reviews.text: Can't wait to return to Culebra! We will definitely plan to stay here next time!
reviews.title: La Romana Apts in Culebra March 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife, dad and nice spent 2 nights in March in La Romana in Culebra and we had an excellent stay. We stayed in two rooms, one of a studio with a queen side bed and the other one was an apartment with two queen side beds with a kitchen.
reviews.title: Great, clean apartments

reviews.text: Both apartments were very clean, and confortable. The apt was about 1.5km from the town and 2.5km from Flamingo. There is a Colmado (mini market) were you can get almost anything but beer or liquor. The owners are very nice and made the entire experience very pain free, before, during and after.
reviews.title: Good choice ...

reviews.text: I do suggest to take cleaning and cooking stuff.... everything, even salt as the apartment is clean empty of cooking condiments.
reviews.title: Best guest house at Culebra

description: La Romana Apartments has a total of 4 apts. that accommodate 2-4 people. Each one has fully dressed beds, A/C, wireless internet, in room bathrooms w/ hot water in shower, satellite TV and full kitchens (kitchenette in studio). We take pride in our cleaning and our affordable prices. Come and visit our island!
